name: Blender Physics test
description:
Just a small game I made in Blender's game engine.

The following is for version 5.0 and up

System Requirements:

- Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10

- Recommended NVIDIA GTX 660

- Recommended Dual-Core Processor

- Recommended 4GB RAM

- Mouse and Keyboard

To be honest, I haven't tested this on any other machines but it should work fairly well on lower-end PCs.

Mass launching Icospheres via Right Click may eventually cause a substantial drop in performance. If this happens, you can use R to restart and refresh the level.
